page.title: 03LEOMINSTER PRIEST'S DAY
page.content: Tuesday 14th May - St.Mathias' Day 6-15a.m. - Get up. 7-00 - Mattins and Meditation at the Priory Church. Call five priests present who make up the team. 7-30 - Holy Communion. 8-30 - Breakfast. 8-45 - Take children to school. 9-30-10-30 - Dictation of letters and sorting out week's business with secretary. 11-00-12noon - Take Communion with an old lady who is housebound. 12noon-1p.m. - Preparation for Deanery Synod and Confirmation Class. 1-1-45 - Lunch. 2-15-4-45 - Meeting of Governors of the Minster School to appoint a new Head of Department for Religious Education. 5p.m. - Tea. 6-00-7-00 - Confirmation Class. 7-00 - Evensong(said) at Priory. 7-30-9-45 - Meeting of Deanory Synod. 12midnight - Bed.
